Dec 11, 2024

Best Community Paper at ACM CoNEXT!

The article from the joint work of Adrien Schoen (Inria) and Joscha Cüppers (CISPA) received the “Best Community Paper” award at the ACM CoNEXT conference. Congratulations!

If you liked this article and think others should read it, please share it on Twitter or Facebook.
